summary: At a carnival called the Garden of Evil, a man is murdered, apparently by a gorilla...or someone in a gorilla suit.
cast: Cameron Mitchell|Anne Bancroft|Lee J. Cobb|Raymond Burr|Charlotte Austin|Peter Whitney|Lee Marvin|Warren Stevens|John Kellogg|George Barrows|John Beradino|Chuck Couch|Billy Curtis|Sayre Dearing|John McKee|Lee Miller|Frank Mills|Joe Ploski|Laffin' Sal|Charles Sherlock|Jack Stoney|Charles Sullivan|Charles Tannen|Max Wagner
title: El gorila asesino
